page.title: 03Two Farms in Cressage
page.content: We visited{Oak Tree Farm}and{New {Buildings Farm. Oak Tree farm is on the north side of Cressage village and New Buildings Farm is on the south side. Mr.Price{rents}Oak Tree Farm.It is a lowland farm which is in the Severn Valley.He has{400 acres}of land. Mr.Turner, however,{owns}New Buildings Farm and that is on higher land above the river valley.He owns 270 acres of land.Mr.Turner has 120 ewes 200{lambs}and 150{beef}cattle. Mr.Price owns 40{sheep}and 250{beef {cattle.}Mr.Turner has 3 people working on his farm and Mr.Price has 4. Both farmers use about half their land for feeding cattle (grazing and silage) and the rest for{crops:wheat,{ {barley}and{sugar beet. }Both farmers use machines a great deal.
